LAGOSUS Lake characteristics

Source: R/LAGOSUS-package.R
locus_characteristics.Rd

Includes derived metrics for each lake such as lake geometry (e.g., area, perimeter, shape metrics), lake connectivity (e.g., lake connectivity class, number of upstream lakes), and whether the lake is located within an area that was glaciated during the Late Wisconsin glaciation.

Details

Variable nameVariable descriptionUnits
lagoslakeidunique lake identifier developed by LAGOS-US
lake_waterarea_hasurface area of lake waterbody polygon from NHD (excludes islands)hectare
lake_totalarea_hasurface area within outer boundary of lake waterbody polygon from NHD (includes islands)hectare
lake_islandarea_hasurface area of islands within outer boundary of lake waterbody polygon from NHDhectare
lake_perimeter_mperimeter of outer boundary of lake waterbody polygon from the NHD (excludes islands)meter
lake_islandperimeter_mperimeter of islands within the lake waterbody polygon from the NHDmeter
lake_shorelinedevfactorshoreline development factor = lake_perimeter / (2*?(?*waterarea))
lake_mbgconhull_length_mthe longest distance entirely within the lake polygon between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull that encloses the lake polygonmeter
lake_mbgconhull_width_mthe shortest distance entirely within the lake polygon between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull that encloses the lake polygonmeter
lake_mbgconhull_orientation_degorientation (from 0 to 180 decimal degrees clockwise from north) of the longest line connecting two vertices entirely within both the convex hull and the lake polygondegree
lake_mbgrect_length_mlength of the minimum bounding geometry rectangle by area enclosing the lake polygonmeter
lake_mbgrect_width_mwidth of the minimum bounding geometry rectangle by area enclosing the lake polygonmeter
lake_mbgrect_arearatioratio between lake_waterarea_ha (* 10000 m^2/ha) and the area of the minimum bounding rectangle by area of the lake polygon; value near 1 indicates lake shape is rectangular
lake_meanwidth_mmean width of the lake calculated as lake water area (lake_area_ha* 10000 m^2/ha) divided by the convex hull length of the focal lake polygon (lake_mbgconhull_length_m)meter
lake_connectivity_classhydrologic connectivity class of the focal lake determined from the NHD network considering both permanent and intermittent/ephemeral flow
lake_connectivity_fluctuatesindicates whether the lake's connectivity classification depends on non-permanent flow
lake_connectivity_permanenthydrologic connectivity class of the focal lake determined from the NHD network considering only permanent flow
lake_lakes1ha_upstream_hatotal area of lakes >= 1 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamshectare
lake_lakes4ha_upstream_hatotal area of lakes >= 4 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamshectare
lake_lakes10ha_upstream_hatotal area of lakes >= 10 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamshectare
lake_lakes1ha_upstream_ncount of lakes >= 1 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamscount
lake_lakes4ha_upstream_ncount of lakes >= 4 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamscount
lake_lakes10ha_upstream_ncount of lakes >= 10 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamscount
lake_glaciatedlatewiscglaciation status during the Late Wisconsin glaciation (status = Glaciated if any part of the lake polygon is inside the glacial extent)
